value: File:Будівля в стилі модерн на центральній вулиці Кіровограда.jpg
One of the buildings in the center of Kirovohrad

) is the administrative center of Kirovohrad Oblast (province, also referred to as Kirovohradschyna) and Kirovohrad Rayon (district). It is an industrial and cultural center of Kirovohrad Oblast. Kirovohrad is located on the Dnieper Upland, on the banks of river Inhul. It is a motorway junction. There is a train station (Znamyanka - Pomoshnaya line) and a civilian airport.  Kirovohrad is not famous for its places of interest, but the downtown still bears the remnants of old architecture. Some of the old buildings are renovated and some are still in the process of renovation. A lot of things still remind of country's Soviet past - many streets still are named after Soviet activists; Lenin busts and statues are a common sight. In recent years the city administration is doing a good job of making Kirovohrad a better place both for locals and tourists. The locals like to call Kirovohrad "a little Paris" due to its resemblance to Paris before the Soviet Union have destroyed the look of the city in the XX century.

in English language publications). From the middle of XIX till the beginning of XX centuries Kirovohrad enjoyed its golden age. The industry was on the increase, the culture flourished. It was there where the first professional Ukrainian theater was opened.

Kirovohrad became the center of Kirovohrad oblast in 1939. The city has a developed social infrastructure and a number of educational and cultural institutions.

Kirovohrad's geographical position has an impact on language. The most common speaking language is
languages). Everyone can speak and understand Ukrainian. The knowledge of English is low, but it won't be a problem in hotels or restaurants where most people can speak decent English.
Currently there are to flights to or from Kirovohrad. The airport is in poor shape and is under reconstruction. After the reconstruction the airport will get an international status.

(two daily) 

There are lot of buses from other Ukrainian cities. It's easy to pay for a ticket online. For that purpose it is advised to use special
highways go through Kirovohrad. M12 is a state international highway (M-highway) that connects
Oblast to the Central Ukraine, where before crossing Dnieper it continues further as M04. M13 is a state international highway connecting Kirovohrad to the border with
, where before crossing Dniester it heads towards Chişinău as part of E584.

Taxi is the easiest way for a foreigner to get around town. Ukrainian taxi drivers can charge foreigners more than locals, it is a common fact. 

Locals use

s to get around. Marshrutkas are a form of public transportation such as a share taxi for the countries of CIS. They are more expensive than regular buses, but the Hail and Ride system make them the most popular way of getting around the city. Riding in marshrutkas is uncomfortable and confusing for foreigners, so its better to use taxi or regular buses or trolley-buses.

value: content=is considered the oldest preserved Earthen Fortress in Europe.  The fortress of Saint Elizabeth (Elizabethan castle) - was the administrative center of the Novoserbskogo settlement (New Serbia and Novoslobodskaya Cossack regiment). Named in honor of the Empress Elizabeth. It had the shape of a regular hexagon, the perimeter (along with external fortifications) to 6 kilometer.
content=Built on the site wood in 1849 in Russian-Byzantine style by the architect Konstantin Ton. The interior of the church the remains of a mural of the second half of XIX century.
name=Church of the Holy Spirit Roman Catholic Church
content=Founded in 1757. Neoclassical architectural style. There are icons of the XVII century.

content=Built in 1813, wooden church. Consecrated 1813. One-story building has an elegant portico with four Corinthian columns. Inside the cathedral, relics of saints and the main shrine kirovogradtsev - the icon of the Mother of God "Elisavetgrad, is the patroness and protector of the city.
name=Kirovograd regional museum of Local History
content=Museum collected more than 80 thousand items, which reflect the history of the region from ancient times to modern times.
content=Various aspects of the life of Jewish communities reveal thematic stands: "Charity", "Religious Life," "Medicine", "Jewish Education", "Cultural Life," "Industry". +phone=+380 52 2243231
content=Henry Gustavovich Neuhaus was - pianist and educator, writer and musical activist.
name=Kirovohrad Art Memorial Museum A.A. Osmerkin

content=Located in the Marko Lukic Kropiwnicki living house. Exposition of the museum consists of several sections that tell about family playwright and actor, about his childhood and education in high school and university, on its way to the arts as the founder of the first professional Ukrainian theater (luminaries). Carefully preserved in a museum relics - documents, photographs, memorabilia, theater posters on the life and work of M. Kropivnitskogo - who was the reformer of the theater, an actor, director, playwright, composer, singer, educator.
content= A great example of old architecture, it was renovated in 2011
content=There are carousels and attractions and a little zoo with farm animals.

content=A modern cinema with 3D and comfortable seats. In Ukraine all films are dubbed and there are no subtitles, so don't expect to understand anything unless you're familiar with Ukrainian language.
directions=Near is located a park, a memorial and a hospital
content=The first Ukrainian professional theatre was renovated in the end of 2012. It looks just like it did when it was first build
content=If you're interested in classical and modern music.

In general, it is very cheap to dine in Kirovohrad by European or US standards. There is a big number of pizzerias - oddly, locals have more Pizzerias than anything else, and any other cuisine is practically ignored. The food is usually tasty and fresh. It is strongly advised to taste the national cuisine. Most famous dishes are borshch, vareniki, draniki (also called deruny).

value: (Сорренто) - an Italian restaurant. Great interior design and atmosphere. The best place to eat in the city. But it is far from the city center.

In the centre there are a lot of cafes with good prices.

content=The Reikartz Kirovograd is a business hotel conveniently located in the central area of the city. The hotel is just a five minute walk from the city center, and it takes only seven minutes to get to the bus and railway stations. It is an ideal venue for both business and leisure guests.

(Subbotsy Village, Shevchenko Street 47) . Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and a summer terrace with sun loungers, this hotel is located in Subbotsy village, 30 km from Kirovohrad city.

, located on the border of Kirovohradska and Mykolayivska oblasts. Missiles: SS-24 "Scalpel" silo-based and RS-20 missile (SS-18 "Satan"). Also in the museum you can see samples of rocket engines, auxiliary vehicles, mock nuclear warhead.
